Calumet - 413
Lake Ridge - 306
Longfellow - 271
We realize a lot can change between now and the start of school. However, we have to plan for unknowns to be prepared. We need to know where you stand today on these issues: masks, fears about returning at all, vulnerable health/medical concerns in your household making it difficult to come back, WiFi needs, and childcare issues arising from hybrid or remote options.
